about_the_game:
Dungeon and Little Demon Hunter new heroes and new maps are coming soon, so stay tuned

This is a mini arcade game with rich operations. If you are a user who likes to mow the grass, please purchase it carefully to avoid unnecessary refunds. The trial version of this product is permanently open and players can experience it freely. The trial version can only play the first two maps, but currently all 7 heroes are open, so players can get familiar with the operations. There will be more exciting content updates in the future.

Dungeon and Little Demon Hunter is a role-playing action adventure game. A long time ago, a continent was invaded by demonic power and the land fell into darkness. The king who ruled the country summoned all forces to form a barrier to protect the royal city. Everything outside the royal city was facing destruction. The king summoned elite warriors to form a demon hunting group to attack. The mission was to destroy the source of demonic power. A contest between justice and evil began.

Unique Attack Mechanism

All heroes follow basic operations, but all heroes have their own skill characteristics. It is mainly divided into directional skills triggered by the up and down keys and combat skills and awakening skills that require cooling time. The up and down directional skills consume physical strength and have no CD. The general attack can stack the damage of the up and down skills, and the combat skills and awakening skills can enhance the damage through equipment.

Hero Combination Mechanism

Players can choose different heroes to fight together, and can switch different heroes. Each hero can be very strong and focus on training according to personal preferences.

Rich Dungeon Adventure Maps

This game strives to show the real-time combat pleasure of 1 vs. 50, rich manual operation and gorgeous combat skills, and strives to bring users a different combat experience. There are all kinds of strange monsters in the dungeon. Each one or several monsters will form a special attack and defense group. Players need to eliminate all enemies within a limited time, and their own scores cannot be lower than the standard value before they can successfully unlock the next map. Players can experience the game step by step.

Reasonable Scoring Mechanism

Every time a player triggers a combo number of 10, 100, 200, 300, 400, 500, 666, they will get points, which will increase in sequence. If the player's attack moves are not so single, it will be judged as a gorgeous combo, and a gorgeous combo can get a higher score. In addition to being used to settle the judgment to get 1 star, high scores can also be accumulated as props points coins. Points coins can improve the player's skill level. Improving the skill level can get higher skill damage, and some skills can get larger and more gorgeous special effects.

Introduction to Weapon and Equipment Mechanism

Players can obtain materials by killing monsters above elite level in adventure maps. The more difficult the map, the more materials will be dropped and the higher the rarity.

Dungeon waiting for your adventure

legal_notice: Todos los materiales del héroe son originales de Ace Game Workshop. Está prohibido desempaquetar, desempacar o cualquier otra infracción.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macos 10.1.2以上
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macos 10.1.2以上
  • Processor: 苹果 M1 或英特尔酷睿 M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Create your own dungeon adventure in "Dungeons and Little Demon Hunters", travel through a dungeon kingdom full of demons, constantly fight through obstacles and eliminate monsters, and invite friends from the demon hunting camp to accompany you. This is a mini Arcade Action Game.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
